plot: Six months after the flooding of the valley much of the town's population have been evacuated, though some remain hoping to find loved ones taken by The Horde. An expert, Richard Berg, arrives tasked with finding the cause of the flood.

Six months after the flood, the army is investigating the causes. The expert Berg replaces the previous one expecting to find what happened to the town. Further, there is still the mystery of the disappearance of the police officers. Most of the population has moved to other places, but some of them are waiting for their beloved ones. Adele is pregnant, although she has tried to abort the child whose father is Justin. A new "returned" has come, Audrey, and Lucy brings her to stay with Claire and Camille that are hidden in a house. Toni has also returned, and Jerome needs to explain to a military officer why he said that Toni was dead. Victor asks Julie to stay with him and suddenly his mother returns.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
